!4 1. Tooltip are only visable on the Front Page and in a edit page
|script|browser test                                                 |
|Go to the Front Page                                                |
|ensure|is visible on page    |xpath=(//div[@id= 'tooltip-div'])     |
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo'])                          |
|ensure|is not visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'tooltip-div'])     |
|ensure|is not visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'tooltip-div-edit'])|
|click |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo?edit'])                     |
|ensure|is visible on page    |xpath=(//div[@id= 'tooltip-div-edit'])|

!4 2. A new tooltip appears when reloading the page 
|script            |browser test                                        |
|Go to the Front Page                                                   |
|ensure            |is visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'tooltip-div'])|
|$tooltip=         |value of          |xpath=(//p[@id= 'tooltip-text']) |
|refresh                                                                |
|$refreshedTooltip=|value of          |xpath=(//p[@id= 'tooltip-text']) |
|value differs     |$tooltip          |from       |$refreshedTooltip    |
